title: Project 1
description: A comprehensive digital transformation for a leading retail brand.
details: This project involved a complete redesign of the user experience and a migration to a modern microservices architecture. Key results included a 40% increase in mobile conversion rates.

title: Project 2
description: Innovative AI-powered solution for predictive maintenance in manufacturing.
details: We developed a suite of machine learning models to analyze sensor data in real-time, predicting equipment failure before it happens. This saved the client millions in downtime costs.

title: Project 3
description: Secure and scalable fintech platform for cross-border payments.
details: Built with a focus on security and reliability, this platform processes thousands of transactions per second across multiple currencies and jurisdictions.

title: Project 4
description: Sleek and intuitive fitness tracking application for iOS and Android.
details: A cross-platform app that synchronizes health data from wearables and provides personalized workout recommendations based on user performance.

title: Project 5
description: Data-driven marketing dashboard for real-time campaign analysis.
details: Integrates with multiple social media and advertising APIs to provide a unified view of marketing spend and performance across all channels.
